reviewText: Totally amazing seeing the original line up. There's a certain chemistry that's untouchable and this iisa quite something.  Not sure that you're modern day fans would get this as much as us old schoolers...
The band is great, the show is good. The menu and the sound is poor, it seems like the disc is defected...
It will not play on our Sony Blu Ray player.  very disappointed!! My husband is a life long Quo fan and this was supposed to be an early Christmas suprise ... so much for that!
This BR will not play even though it allegedly is Region A (USA) or all region. I think it may be PAL
The blu-ray version of this requires Gracenote to play.  If you do not have Gracenote or have access to it, the disc will not play.
